data.name: Crypchania Demo
data.detailed_description:
About the game:
Crypchania is a game that is focussing on story, exploring, lore, puzzles, and battles. The main story is about 40 hours long and with the side quests you have 120 hours of gameplay. There are special gear sets to find that give you unique abilities, like the assasination set (you can kill your enemies from behind without getting into battle, lambo set give you more walking speed). There is no need for grinding if you follow the main story and do some side quests, mini-games, co-ops from time to time. The steam release has some additional changes from the original.

About the Demo:
Play the first part of the story and most of the side quests. There is enough to explorer to have know the game and it's potentials.
You also tranfser your progress when switching to the full game, just login what you normally would do and talk yo Mia at one of the inn's to become a VIP-Courier to progress your adventure.

Story
You thought that you were a simple courier that delivers packages from town to town in the world of Crypchania. But to be honest, you are one of a kind. When rescuing a girl named Eveey and taking her safely back to her uncle's house, her uncle tells a story about a stranger that crashed down in his yard and died a few days ago. The stranger had some special gear with him but also a package with an address.
Not knowing what to do, you are asked to deliver the package, you are a courier after all. From this moment on your big adventure awaits. But on your way, strange things are happening and you face many obstacles before you reach your destination. Along the way, It does make you curious about what is inside this package, and why some are after it.

data.short_description: The demo contains the first part of Crypchania, you van play the main story and a decent ammount of side-quests and secrets. The progress you make will be transferred to the full game to continue your adventures from the demo.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: One with OpenGL support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound system
